content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia Müller, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to propose a rental price of 450 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating. What is your counteroffer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your proposal, Emilia. While I appreciate your interest, I am not willing to accept a rental price of 450 Euros per month. I believe that the apartment's value warrants a higher price. I would be open to discussing a rental price of 600 Euros per month. What is your counteroffer to this?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your concerns, but I am not able to offer more than 450 Euros per month. Is there any way we can reach an agreement on this price?

Also, I would like to mention that I am a dependable and responsible tenant, and I always pay my rent on time. I hope this information will help us find a mutually beneficial solution.

Lastly, I would like to ask if you can provide any references or recommendations from previous tenants who have rented your apartment in Mannheim?

Thank you for your time!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your response, Emilia. While I appreciate your willingness to pay, I am still not willing to accept a rental price of 450 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing a rental price of 550 Euros per month.

Regarding your references, I am glad to hear that you have a good track record of being a responsible tenant and paying rent on time. Please provide me with the necessary information, and I will be happy to review it.

Thank you for your interest in my apartment, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
